references.formattedCitation: Talbert, Richard J. A., ed. Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World. Princeton, N.J.: Princeton University Press, 2000. http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/43970336.

description: A river of the Peloponnese and tributary of the Alpheios, which it joins from the north at the ancient site of Olympia in Greece.
